Last departure date 13 July 2011.

Valid on departures until 13 July 2011 on flights from Sun to Thu. Return flights Mon to Fri until 20 July 2011. Outbound flights depart London Heathrow at 12.15pm and arrive Lanarca at 6.40pm. Return flights depart Lanarca at 8.15am and arrive London Heathrow at 11.15am.
Price is per person and based on 2 adults sharing on a half board basis. Maximum 2 adults and 2 children (under 12 years). 1st child prices: 4 nights £175, 5nts £195, 7nts £195. 2nd child prices: 4nts £195, 5nts £225, 7nts £275. Infant (under 24 mths at date of return travel) £70pp. Single occupancy supplements apply: 4nts £125pp, 5nts £145pp, 7nts £195pp. All inclusive upgrade supplements: 4nts £79pp, 5nts £99pp, 7nts £129pp. Return hotel transfers excluded, £25pp. Flights include meal and bar service, 20kg hold luggage, 5kg hand luggage.

  • Kir Royale on arrival for guests and sparkling wine for your toast
  • Personal wedding coordinator to assist you throughout 
  • Overnight accommodation for the bridal couple
  • Matron of Ceremonies, red carpet, DJ and disco
  • Silver cake knife and stand, place cards, canvas table plan and menus
  • Reduced accommodation rates for your guests (25% discount off existing wedding brochure rates) 
  • Free car parking
  • £95 fee for use of photography on the premises can be arranged with the hotel
deal.conditions:
Expires 30 December 2011. 
1 Groupon per wedding with up to 60 Guests, may buy multiple as gifts. Before purchasing reserve provisional date on: 01623 835333 and confirm within 10 days of purchase, failure to confirm will result in loss of date. Once booked, date is non-transferable.  Valid Mon-Thu between Jun-Dec 2011 and on the following weekends:
Jun 10, 11, 12;  Jul 3, 10, 17, 24; Aug 7, 14, 21, 26, 28; Sept 11, 18, 25; Oct 2, 9, 29, 30; Nov 5, 13, 20, 27; Dec 4, 17, 30. Additional guests at £60 per person for entire day, £11.25 for evening only. Max capacity is 120 in morning and 200 in evening. Package covers: 

three course wedding meal with 2 drinks per guest, evening buffet, 

drink 

on arrival for every guest, 

wedding coordinator, 

overnight stay for the couple, 

Matron of Ceremonies and red carpet service,

 

silver cake knife and stand, 

place cards and menus, entertainment and 

25% off guest accommodation when booking.

18 and over with valid ID for alcohol options. The image above is taken from within the grounds of Clumber Park National Trust Park. The fee for use of photography on their premises is £95, and can be arranged via the hotel.
